T02D3745:79b-1: a'arya au tsushma dzambha la krishna s'a dha nam /
T02D3745:79b-3: 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3745:79b-4: rje btsun dzambha la'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3745:79b-5: dpal gyi dbang phyug dbang chen bcu gnyis rin chen rnam pa mang ldan pa //
T02D3745:79b-6: thabs mang stobs chen dri med thugs rje drang srong lha mi'i sras gyur de'i //
T02D3745:79b-7: sras gcig mtshungs med ma lus srid dang zhi ba'i nor bdag gter chen ni //
T02D3745:79b-8: mi'u thung cha byad thod khrag ne le 'dzin mdzad khyod kyis bdag la srungs //
T02D3745:79b-9: re zhig sgrub pa po dam tshig can gzhan la
T02D3745:79b-10: phan par brtson pas 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la mi
T02D3745:79b-11: phyed pa'i dang ba thob pas skyabs su song la
T02D3745:79b-12: padma'i 'dab ma mchog gi snod dang /
T02D3745:79b-13: gnod sbyin mo kun du rgyug gi lus lingga chen
T02D3745:79b-14: po'i rdzas dang ldan pas nor bu brtsegs pa lta
T02D3745:79b-16: thog mkho nar mi bskyod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin mnyes par bya'o //
T02D3745:79b-17: de'i 'og tu de'i nga rgyal gyis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas la /
T02D3745:79b-18: rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3745:79b-19: rgyas pa la gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po gser
T02D3745:79b-20: gyi mdangs can las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu
T02D3745:79b-21: pa gyen du langs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i ngang
T02D3745:80a-0: tshul can / dbus kyi rva rtse rnam pa dkar po nor bu'i tog @80a * //
T02D3745:80a-2: rva gzhan gnag cing kun nas bgrad pas 'jigs par
T02D3745:80a-3: byed pa de nyid kyi lta bar zla ba dri
T02D3745:80a-4: ma med pa la h'um yig bee d'urya'i 'od 'bar
T02D3745:80a-5: bas mtshan pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D3745:80a-6: yi ge de'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par
T02D3745:80a-7: bkang nas zhing gi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyor ba'i
T02D3745:80a-9: tshur 'dus pa las rje btsun rmugs 'dzin nag po
T02D3745:80a-10: sras dang bcas pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang
T02D3745:80a-12: khrus gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i yan lag bcu gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D3745:80a-13: mnyes pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba bdag gi snying la
T02D3745:80a-14: zhugs te bskul ba'i yid kyis tshad med pa bzhi
T02D3745:80a-15: spel zhing / byang chub kyi sems brtan pa yang dag pa goms pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D3745:80a-16: de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer chen pos brtan pa
T02D3745:80a-17: dang g-yo ba'i dngos po mtha' dag rnam par bzhu
T02D3745:80a-18: nas / rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor thim pa dang /
T02D3745:80a-19: yang ches cher 'bar bas rang gi lus kyang nye
T02D3745:80a-20: bar bsregs nas gzi brjid kyi phung po sgyu ma
T02D3745:80a-21: lta bu'i bdag nyid du bsam mo //
T02D3745:80a-22: de'i 'og tu aom aa zhes skad gsang bstod de
T02D3745:80a-23: spran pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D3745:80a-24: mgon po byang phyogs kyi tshal rdo rje'i ri bo'i
T02D3745:80a-26: kun nas dang zhing sim la gdung ba'i yid kyis
T02D3745:80a-27: rgyu'i sems dpa' de 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'bar
T02D3745:80a-29: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D3745:80a-30: nor gyi dbang phyug / lha dang klu dang mi'i
T02D3745:80a-31: nor thams cad 'dzin pa mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs
T02D3745:80a-32: can mi'u thung gi cha byad rigs ngan gyi rnam
T02D3745:80a-33: pa / rna ba ma phug pa /
T02D3745:80a-34: lhag ma za zhing mi srun pa /
T02D3745:80a-35: gsus pa cher 'phyang zhing rab tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid /
T02D3745:80a-36: khye'u lo drug lon pa'i na tshod can /
T02D3745:80a-38: zhabs gnyis 'dor stabs su nye bar gnas pas nor
T02D3745:80a-39: 'dzin ser po kha nas nor bu skyugs pa'i mgo
T02D3745:80a-40: g-yas su rnam par mnan pa /
T02D3745:80a-41: mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing /
T02D3745:80a-42: ljags rkan phugs su nye bar 'dril ba /
T02D3745:80a-43: zhal dang spyan gsum me'i phung po ltar 'bar zhing /
T02D3745:80a-44: spyan kun nas zlum zhing bzlog la rnam par bsgyur ba can /
T02D3745:80b-0: dbral @80b ba la rin po che mig gsum pa'i
T02D3745:80b-1: gzugs can gyi khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang ldan
T02D3745:80b-2: pa / dbu skra dang sma ra dang smin ma
T02D3745:80b-3: rnams kyi spu kham pa re re nas gyen du
T02D3745:80b-4: langs shing 'od 'phro ba'i me stag thur du 'dzag
T02D3745:80b-5: pa / pa / phyag g-yas dang g-yon gyis padma'i snod du ti ras bkang ba dang /
T02D3745:80b-6: ne'u le'i rkyal pa lha dang klu dang mi'i nor
T02D3745:80b-7: bu rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba du mas
T02D3745:80b-8: khengs par bya pa'i kha nas rin po che'i rgyun
T02D3745:80b-10: sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan can /
T02D3745:80b-11: klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /
T02D3745:80b-25: dmar po rnam pa brgyad kyis go rims ltar thor tshugs dang /
T02D3745:80b-32: rkang pa rnams la brgyan pa'o //
T02D3745:80b-33: thugs kar zla ba la ji skad bshad pa'i snying po can gyi mtshan ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3745:80b-34: de nas rdo rje'i yi ge bcu'i go cha bgo bar bya ste /
T02D3745:80b-54: h'a rnams kyi yig 'bru rnams zla ba'i gdan dang /
T02D3745:80b-55: rdo rje phyed pa la gnas pa nyi ma'i snying
T02D3745:80b-56: po 'bar ba'am gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par dag
T02D3745:80b-58: thugs dkyil mi phyed yi ge las 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa kun mchod cing //
T02D3745:80b-59: go cha bcur bcas skyob dbang nyid 'phros ma lus 'gro rnams rang 'dra byas //
T02D3745:80b-60: ne'u le klu dbang nor bdag 'od ldan lha klu mi yi nor rnams bsdus //
T02D3745:80b-61: zos shing zos te 'grangs gyur btsir bas de skyugs dngos grub yang yang blang //
T02D3745:80b-62: de nas chu sbyin par bya ste /
T02D3745:80b-63: lag pa'i mthil du bam ser po las gser gyi
T02D3745:80b-64: bum pa bzang po rin po che sna tshogs skyugs
T02D3745:80b-65: pa kha phyir bskyil ba'i yi ge bam de nyid
T02D3745:81a-1: bam gyi nang du dzam yig go //
T02D3745:81a-2: mkhrig ma la ni aom mo //
T02D3745:81a-8: nor bu mching ba'i gnas su ye'o //
T02D3745:81a-9: lag mthil gyi lto g-yon du sv'a'o //
T02D3745:81a-11: thams cad kyang zla ba la gnas shing /
T02D3745:81a-12: gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba lhag par 'tsher bltar bsam mo //
T02D3745:81a-13: de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar gtugs te /
T02D3745:81a-14: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a
T02D3745:81a-15: zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re
T02D3745:81a-16: dang / kha dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa la gnyis te bdun gyis byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3745:81a-17: de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku
T02D3745:81a-18: yongs su rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi padma'i rin po
T02D3745:81a-20: rang gi thugs ka nas ci 'dra ba'i sku gzugs phyung ste bstims la /
T02D3745:81a-21: rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad kyis sbras
T02D3745:81a-22: pa yongs su gang bas rgyun mi 'chad pas chu
T02D3745:81a-23: spyin par bya'o // 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D3745:81a-24: aom dzlum sv'a h'a zhes bya bas rin po ches brgyan pa'i lag pa nas zhal du'o //
T02D3745:81a-25: zhal nas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo ru'o //
T02D3745:81a-26: de nas slar lag mthil du 'bab ba'i rim pas
T02D3745:81a-27: mthar chu'i bdag po'i zhal du 'jug par bsams te
T02D3745:81a-28: / cho ga de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3745:81a-29: de'i tshe phyag gi mthil gyi bum pa dang /
T02D3745:81a-30: ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i
T02D3745:81a-31: sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thams cad
T02D3745:81a-32: las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing
T02D3745:81a-33: yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma'i char chen
T02D3745:81a-34: po phab pas gnas khang la sogs pa mtha' dag
T02D3745:81a-35: yog cing nor gyis gang bar gyur par bsam mo
T02D3745:81a-36: // de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing /
T02D3745:81a-37: thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod do //
T02D3745:81a-38: sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3745:81a-39: na mo ra tna tra y'a ya /
T02D3745:81a-40: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya /
T02D3745:81a-41: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D3745:81a-42: aom dzam mbha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3745:81a-43: zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du
T02D3745:81a-44: bzlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba
T02D3745:81a-45: gdab po // de nas yang mchod pas gtang rag
T02D3745:81b-0: phul te me tog @81b dbul bzhag nas yi ge
T02D3745:81b-1: brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang la rten spyi bo
T02D3745:81b-2: dang chu'i phud srin lag gis reg ste lce la
T02D3745:81b-3: gdab po // bzhag cing / chu'i tshogs rgya mtshor 'jug ba'i dogs su dor bar bya'o //
T02D3745:81b-4: de ltar zla ba drug la sogs par nyin lan
T02D3745:81b-5: gsum mtshan lan gsum du bar ma chad bar chu
T02D3745:81b-6: spyin pa la brtson par byed na /
T02D3745:81b-7: des ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3745:81b-8: dbang phyug snying po gter bum las //
T02D3745:81b-9: lcags kyus lcag btab zas nor ster //
T02D3745:81b-10: bram ze'i tshang skyogs lda tshan lngas /
T02D3745:81b-11: bkang te bcud bsdus dngos grub len //
T02D3745:81b-12: rin chen snying po nyi zla dang //
T02D3745:81b-13: padma rab sbyangs bde chen thob //
T02D3745:81b-14: rim bzhin gnod spyin ne'u le mo //
T02D3745:81b-15: thong khrag pur ling sbyor bar bshad //
T02D3745:81b-16: dbyar dgun ston zla tha chungs dang //
T02D3745:81b-17: dpyid zla 'bring la rten bzhengs nas //
T02D3745:81b-19: dam tshig ye shes mnyam sbyor bya ;
T02D3745:81b-20: / rna ba mnan dang mdangs 'phrog dang //
T02D3745:81b-21: dgra bo byis pa'i gzugs 'jigs pas //
T02D3745:81b-22: rigs ngan gdug pa'i las gsum byed //
T02D3745:81b-23: khro zhal phrin las bgegs skrod yin //
T02D3745:81b-25: nor bdag gzir bas nor rnams 'phrog / rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed dang //
T02D3745:81b-26: 'jigs skyob rkun po srung ba nyid //
T02D3745:81b-27: bu ster tshe ni bsring ba dang //
T02D3745:81b-28: phyugs skyong bskyed cing gzugs pa dang //
T02D3745:81b-29: dbang bskur bkra shis gsol ba ste //
T02D3745:81b-30: rim bzhin aom nas sv'a h'a'a'i bar //
T02D3745:81b-32: slar bzlog yi ge bcu yis so //
T02D3745:81b-33: rdo rje h'um mdzad khros pa yis //
T02D3745:81b-34: tsha ba dug dang khrag ske tshe //
T02D3745:81b-35: mar khus lus byugs pur ling gdung //
T02D3745:81b-36: bdun phrag gcig gis spogs na 'grub //
T02D3745:81b-37: ye ya dha na me dhe bam sv'a h'a /
T02D3745:81b-38: snyigs dus sgrub rnams rab dbul nyen rnams kyis //
T02D3745:81b-39: phan 'dod bzhin yang rang gzhan don nyams par //
T02D3745:81b-40: mthong nas rmugs 'dzin cho ga tshul bzhin bris //
T02D3745:81b-41: dge bas kun la 'dod spyin ster gyur cig /
T02D3745:81b-42: dpal rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thams gsang
T02D3745:81b-43: ba las kyang ches gsang ba sbas pa'i bum pa
T02D3745:82a-0: slob dpon nor spyin gyis mdzad @82a * //
T02D3745:82a-3: // / dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla
T02D3745:82a-4: dang bral ba'i pandi ta chen po sh'akya shr'i bha
T02D3745:82a-5: dra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis /
T02D3745:82a-8: bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyal
T02D3745:82a-9: bo'i pho brang yid bzhin nor bu'i mdzod dbu rtse
T02D3745:82a-10: rim gsum lha khang gi steng du bkra shis ba'i
